name: Maison Real Estates
description: Maison Estates Ltd is a new generation a
overview:
Maison Estates Ltd is a new generation letting agent in Coventry, UK centering on providing client satisfaction, speed, delivery and efficiency. Built and conceptualised by directors Sanjay Panchal and Ben Herbert, Maison specialises in residential lettings, executive serviced properties and works as advisors to ‘Buy to Let’ entrepreneurs on completely new purchases. Using our extensive information, expertise in addition to our circle of clientele, we are best placed to serve YOU!

At Maison Estates LTD. offers landlords the traditional “Effectively Supervised, Rent Receipt and Tenant Find services” as well as a bespoke service to satisfy your requirements. Protect your rental revenue by having a rent guarantee (ABSOLUTELY FREE for the first 6 months of every new Let) with a NIL excess exclusive to our Fully Managed service.Maison Real Estates Coventry Letting Agency is committed to letting your property and conducts viewings the whole week including evenings.

Serviced Apartments is a strong market in Coventry with more and more corporates and professionals looking to utilise this form of stay. Not only are serviced apartments being generally inexpensive than hotels, furthermore you will get pleasure from extra space, efficiency, flexibility and personal privacy than in a hotel room. Maison Real Estates Ltd have accessibility to an array of high specification one and two bedroom, high-class serviced apartments largely located in and around the city centre.
